FuncDef: This command is used for remote mirroring, where the mirror source is a separate system then the mirror destination. The mirror source can only be of IP type and is only supported for the following services: IES, VPRN, VPLS and IPIPE. The mirror destination on a remote system will configure an interface on a VPRN asip-mirror-interface. This interface only supports spoke sdp termination. The IP mirror interface requires PBR to determine the next outgoing interface for the mirror packet to be delivered to.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the IP interface, up to 32 characters. An interface name cannot be in the form of an IP address.
Keyword used to create an IP mirror interface.
